title: Tested Positive for PCP
author: Tynes
citation: Citation:   Tynes . "Tested Positive for PCP: experience with Venlafaxine & Buspirone (ID 67173)". Erowid.org. Dec 11, 2007. erowid.org/exp/67173
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

[ Switch Colors ]
report: In 2005 when I was at a wilderness program for substance abuse, I went on a visit with my parents. After consuming large amounts of nutmeg (which doesnt show up on a drug test) in order to get high and taking my normal dose of effexor and buspar, I failed a drug test 2 weeks in a row for pcp. The second week the program knew I wasnt lieing because I was living in a tent in the mountains of colorado and it would have been imposible for me to get pcp, which I've never used. Ever.[Erowid Note: Venlafaxine (Effexor) can cause false positives for PCP on urinalysis tests.]
